values: Hi LJ! I was rereading my most recent blogs and I have to say they're quite melancholy. It's not that I really am this somber pessimistic person, but I think it's actually very therapeutic to write out how I'm feeling. I'm not particularly close with anyone anymore. That sounds depressing, but it's actually not. When you grow up, if you aren't married or you're not raising children, I don't think it's really possible to be that open with anyone. I also think my geographical location has a lot to do with my lack of ability or desire to relate to people. As I've said before, I could attempt to open up and pour my soul out of the urn but considering the criticism and "I'm sorry to hear's" I think I do better this way. Still working at the old car factory. It isn't a bad job but it's certainly not a career. When people ask me if I'm going to retire there I usually respond with something along the lines of "God, I hope not." It's a void. There are no real embellishing and pretty words to make it more glamorous than what it is. You can't really have a real life outside because of the ridiculous hours and finding people who can work around your crazy schedule is hard to come by. I understand now the reasons for all the affairs and coworker relationships but I can't indulge. If I were to hookup with anyone at work I'd wither. I get bored so easily and I tire of talking about work or even thinking about it when I'm not there. Hell, I don't like thinking about it when I AM there. I think I need to start bringing my notebooks to work. That way, when I'm at my desk I can start writing down bits and pieces of stories I've had rattling around in my brain for awhile. I love to write. It's my passion, but like anything else when it comes to me, I get distracted so easily. I've also come to realize I've been far too tolerant of conflict breeding individuals. I don't know why it is I fall so easily for aggressive and cold men. I haven't been respecting myself the past 5 years by allowing myself to be treated so horribly. I am a forgiver, but I don't think I can keep reconciling myself to being verbally abused and treated like a come and go commodity. I'm a soul with thoughts and feelings. Apparently, if you have tits and and female genitals you deserve to be treated shamefully if you aren't submissive...yeah, fuck that. I'm getting a pretty fat check this weekend (or so I've been told). I'm going to put most of it back for my continued house hunting, but I think I'll use some of it for a vacation. I work too much. I never take off. I always make the excuse that because I'm a young single woman that I need the money (which I really do) but still...life is far too short and as far as I know we only get one. I need to have fun. Not sure where I'll end up for memorial weekend but it's sort of become a tradition for me to take an extra long weekend. I need to stop taking guys on trips with me that try to make moves though. It gets old and predictably boring. I just HATE when people think just because there are two people off the opposite sex that there has to be some type of romantic or sexual chemistry there. Can you not just have fun with zero expectations? Can you not just have a few drinks without assuming or hoping it might lead to something else? I tell you one thing, there is nothing more positively euphoric than sitting outside on a starry night somewhere with a cold drink and a cheerful conversation about anything and everything. That's why I want a house, LJ. I want a back porch I can sit on with a beer or mixed drink in hand, and truly enjoy the company and creation around me. It's the simple things, but I'll be damned if the simple things aren't ridiculously impossible to accomplish. Well, gotta get ready for work, liebling. Vielen Dank, AmberElle

LJ,

I'm thinking too much again, but I can't really force it away. I wish there was a way I could get peace. I've accepted how things are but I can't find the cheer in it. "Look at the glass half full" they always say. Sometimes I do, but there's still a lot of fresh wounds that aren't healing. What am I doing wrong? I've prided myself in this personal evolution but there's a heavy compromise. The memories linger. I can't will them away but I hate to involuntarily dwell on them. I've made the necessary changes. I've sacrificed what I wanted for the sake of doing what's right. And let's face it, doing the right thing is a heavy weight to carry. No one else understands it so they can't empathize and it just...sucks. I'm not miserable.  It may sound that way, but I'm not. I'm just detached and I can't relate anymore. It's a deep exhale and an onslaught of questions I have the answers to and I don't know where to go from here. What should I do? I don't want to relive past mistakes. I just want to recover. How am I going to get through this, LJ? Just you,  and me, and the trinity.  The going is rough and I don't see a win in the near future, but I'm hopeful. Fortunes change,you must believe.

~AE

Well LJ, It looks like it's been another freaking year!!! You want to know the truth? The real reason I fell off the map was because I was getting anonymous comments and had a pretty good inclination as to whom they might be coming from, but I digress. How've I been? Meh. That one bland little word pretty much hits the nail on the head. I'm ok...not great, not terrible...just ok. To be perfectly sincere I'm very empty these days. I think I've lost the ability to be comfortable around anyone I can't relate to, and let's face it, I can't relate to anyone anymore. Have you ever poured your guts out to someone just have them regard you with cold disinterest or apathy? That's what's happened to me. I've grown very weary of it. I want to look someone in the eyes and see a keen sense of interest in them when I'm speaking. I want to know they WANT to hear what I have to say. I can't find anyone that genuinely cares and that deeply disconcerts me. My God! I've completely forgotten how much of a relief it is to exert exactly how I'm feeling and what I'm thinking into writing. I've missed this, LJ. I've missed this electronic telepathy we have. I know when I write this out you're not going to stare back at me blankly with cold indifference. I can say whatever I have to and you just accept it. I love the ease with which this comes to me. I've done it all, you know. I've sat in doctor's offices and told my story. I've spoken to strangers about it. I've spoken to "friends" about it. I've spoken to holy men about it. I've told them all, and yet I felt no sense of relief. It actually felt worse to give someone the KNOWLEDGE of what I've been thinking and what I've felt and just know that they hadn't at all heard anything I said. You cry a hundred thousand tears and what happens? People don't want to empathize. They don't want to comfort you. They want you to make THEM feel comfortable. They don't want to deal with your soul. They don't want to see your soul. They just want to see your body. They just want to see your emotions. They just want to see what's easy for them to write off, but no one wants to peer inside your heart and really reach out to you. It takes a far greater amount of effort and talent to see a person's soul. I think only a handful of people out there are capable. I'm ok, LJ. I'm struggling. I'm struggling because I realize I have to jump this hurdle alone. I realize now that people don't want to understand, but I'm alright, you know. I've made it a habit of blocking people I no longer think should be a part of my daily existence. I believe social media, text messages, and this new fangled impersonal world we live in makes friendship and love far too casual for my liking. I think it's high time those who want to be a part of my life make it known. I'm ok...I'm just wandering for now. I want to start writing more. I want to express myself more freely. I need to exert this energy that's festering inside me. I think I'm going to make this a habit no matter WHO comments on it. And if anyone out there is going to comment on my thoughts and my words from the discrete safety of anonymity than I suggest you make yourself known or I will otherwise disable those comments. In any case this feels pretty liberating. I want to divulge myself more openly into this. I know I've said so before but I really need this. I'll write back soon, LJ. Hold it down for me. ~AE

Hi little livejournal. I've come to really like posting my thoughts here. I can't really express myself to a person very well...i've never been particularly good at that. It's always been easier to communicate through written text for me. And I guess it's easier here, because a computer isn't going to be overly critical of me. It isn't going to tell me that I'm being too emotional or that I take everything to heart when I shouldn't. I'm going to click and post and that's going to be the end of it. In a way, I'm really happy none of my friends read this anymore. I like the intimacy of this. I love the fact that it's so personal. And it's nice having someone to talk to...in a manner of speaking. 

I'm very sad, little journal. A sad fool. I've come to take reality with a grim acceptance, but there's too much I don't understand. I think I'm stripped of all my innocence. I wish I could get a fraction of it back...I wish I could be carefree again. I wish I could live in a dream land. I wish I could still believe that there are ways to achieve your goals without compromising something along the way. You can't...people are inevitably corrupt. The bottom line to everything goes back to how much of yourself you're willing to sacrifice. I can't compromise my values...because doing that comes back to haunt you. Being immoral hurts oneself more than it does anyone else. And I learned years ago that sin actually does affect everyone. I don't want to hurt other people.

"Fortunes change, you must believe" That's a quote from one of my characters from an original story...one I've never gotten from poetry to novel. That metamorphosis is hard. It's hard to focus. But really...as corrupt as the character that said that is...he's right I think. Fortunes do change, but when? I'm getting older now. I know what I want. More than anything. I could care less about money. Fancy cars, furniture, homes...I don't care about all that. I'll make do with what I have. I just want people who care in my life. But these days those kind of people are conspicuously absent. I'm trying to be a better person. I'm trying so hard to resist bad things. I've stopped believing lies, I've stopped entertaining fantasies, and all I'm trying to do is find a little bit of sunshine. It's harder than it looks. 

I'm not in desolation or anything. I'm just disappointed in people. There's so many gentlemen friends that have really let me down in recent times. Empty promises, blatant lies, the usual lines "I really value our friendship"...but what he's really more interested in is busting his nut. *Sigh* It gets old. The lies get old. The facades get old. I'm getting old. I'm getting tired. Just yesterday a good friend at work, whom I always kid around with playfully, was adamantly trying to get my #. It really crushed me. Why, you ask? Because he's married with 3 kids and always brags about his devotion and love for them. It upset me because I was shocked he'd really try that. What's so wrong about asking for a number? It's inappropriate for someone who's married. I'm sure his wife wouldn't appreciate that and the saddest part about it is...that happens to me all the time. When you think you can let your guard down and really have fun and be open with someone that drop that bomb. Lust or boredom. He's getting antzy. They come to me because they think I'm an opportunity. A nice distraction. I've come to realize that's all i am to them. 

Girls don't want to be friends. It always has to be a competition with ANYTHING. So pretty much all my friends are guys...it's just getting difficult. When one of them subtly drops a line or makes a lewd comment it hurts me because that trust isn't there anymore. My really good friends don't live in the area, the state, or some of them even in this country. I miss them :( I miss my Canadian friends, my Japanese friends, and my old friends from college who've all moved on and have little families of their own. I wish not everything I got attached to had to leave. I'm really lonely little LJ. I need to pray more but its so hard now. It's hard to believe that fortunes really will change. Can God really let me move on? I've done some pretty terrible things and you know and I know I've had to pay for them. I've learned! I really have! I'm trying so hard to be better. I just want someone to need me...that's all. It doesn't have to be romantic. Just good honest people who care. 

I hope the next two nights at work go by quickly. I'm ready for the weekend. Hope to be in touch again real soon LJ. Maybe I'll have a sunnier post next time :) Let's pray for sunshine in my life! Fortunes will change...maybe soon. I sure hope so. Until next time!

I don't understand. I don't understand people. At all. Why are people nihilists? Why can they not be happy with the simple pleasures of life? It's not fair. I'm envious of them. The people with families...the people with spouses and children...the people with something to go home to...they're all so sickeningly selfish. How can you cheat on someone who's been faithful to you? How can you fuck someone and tell them you love them and then get into bed with your husband and wife that same night? How CAN YOU DO THAT?!!! How is it fair that they get to have their cake and eat it too? Be strong, wives! Be strong husbands!! Leave them! I know I would...Who wants to stay in a miserable loveless relationship "for the sake of the kids" or because they want to "work things out" One mistake can be forgiven. But turning a blind eye to infidelity because you're afraid to be alone is ridiculous! You'd be surprised what strength you possess. 

It breaks my heart. To hear about people in marriage counseling and the same shit keeps recycling itself over and over again. Why waste the money if you know you're not going to change? Why live a lie? I don't get it. Why entertain a false fantasy? Do you not know that a fantasy is just that? It's imaginary. People are pretty painted shells on the outside...but on the inside we've all got our ugliness and dark ambitions. The secret to love...is ACCEPTING the stripped, ugly, dark, and frightening dimensions inside the other entity and loving them anyway. Beauty fades, sex is empty without the passion, and we're all made of dust anyway. I wish I could find a person who finds beauty in souls instead of lust in a shell body. 

I'm getting tired. Tired of all this corruption. Be thankful for people who love you. Be thankful for your beautiful children (the ones who carry on your legacy) Be thankful that you have something besides alcohol to kiss you goodnight. You know it says in the book of Ecclesiastes that by sad countenance the heart is made better..and the day of a man's death is happier than the day of his birth. I'm beginning to find meaning in that verse. Not that I'm anxious to die or anything..for my own reasons...but I really do believe that the wisest souls are the souls that have been in mourning. Everything I hope in time will come...

I am STARVING right now. I don't need to go livestock and start eating just for the hell of it though. I've gotten fat enough as it is (10 lbs fatter to be exact) and it's beyond annoying. I guess I stopped thinking about weight gain when I LOST all that weight this summer with the anxiety and depression streak. It really got to me when people kept asking at an alarming rate why I was dropping weight rapidly. The pains of emotional strife have never mixed well with my physical being and I tend to drop weight over any stress. After I forced myself into perseverance I started eating again and now it's definitely starting to show...much to my chagrin. The crunches and kamakaze work out will just have to resume. 

*Sigh* On another note the big sis and her family are going back to Canada early next week and I regret that I've not gotten to spend hardly any time with them. I'm happy I got to attend the little niece and nephy boo's birthday bash and my niece's baptism and a sunday luncheon at my grandmother's with the whole fam...but with my job it really wasn't possible to spend as much time as I would've wanted. It's not easy taking care of every day expenses on your own. The cost of living...yeah just the amount it takes to keep you alive and breathing is way too much these days. It's the life I keep choosing though. 

My stomach really does feel like it's about to turn over and eat itself though. Hummmmmmm :////// I need to start back on my fanfiction...and keep adding to my collection of original works. Time...time and focus. Two things I don't have a lot of these days that are mandatory for that type of creativity. Well, I'll go ahead and add to my infinite list of things that seriously need more diligence from me. I gotten way to comfortable with apathy these days. This calloused exoskeleton I've developed could really use a soft touch. 

Until next time, darling dear :)

So little electronic journal...this is an odd time for an update (seeing that it's 5:30 in the morn) buttttttt i just escaped a rather irritating graveyard shift. Well it's already Sunday and I don't know why but I'm starting to regress back into an old state of loneliness, isolation, self worth issues, and depression. I'm trying really hard to fight off so many temptations and frankly I'm sick to death of it. I'm trying to be a better person, a better human being, and a better friend to people but every time I try so hard to rise above it all these awful temptations manifest themselves constantly and it's really really hard to say no sometimes. I find I'm having to detach myself from people altogether these days and it's really starting to take a toll on my mental health. I want...no I NEED to be social but I can't be around people who just want to take whatever they can get from me. Sometimes, in my heart, I feel the darkest desires overwhelm me and I have no choice but to completely pull away completely. It's not that I don't care...it's not that I don't like them but I can't live with thoughts and the guilt that would haunt me forever. 

I'm already struggling with these nightmares...the same ones that threaten me week after week. Either loved ones of a person I've given into harass me or I end up being dragged into hell and hear the sins repeating over and over again in my head while the ones I loved dearly turn their backs on me. I can't take the burning in hell dream...I hear that voice in my head sometimes and i can't take it. "you're going to hell Amber. You'll burn for what you've done" 

So I completely separate myself from it. I want so badly to be close to someone. During the week it isn't so bad. I hear from my friends and I stay fairly preoccupied at work. It's always the weekends that get to me, though. I want to go out...I miss going out. But all the places I used to enjoy are infested with things or men that would ask of me what I can't succumb to. I really hope God hears me. I'm sorry that I don't pray as much as I should or go to church like I know I need to...but I hope he understands I'm trying really hard and I'm struggling desperately. I need to be inspired by goodness...are there no good souls left in the world? Is everyone out to take what they can get?

I can't believe I haven't posted an update on this page in over 4 years. It's quite remarkable seeing the evolution of my mindset. I used to complain SO much. I suppose I'm still a hot head but all in all I'm a lot less quick to rant about things of childish nature (i've progressed to whining about things beyond my control these days) So where should I begin? Let's see obviously the previously mentioned boyfriend I lived with is no longer in the picture. I moved back to my home state of Mississippi over 3 years ago and I've been through some pretty tumultuous relationships and situations. It's hard to believe I'm the same girl that sat around all day crying about part time jobs and annoying not quite "in-laws". My how the years do fly. These days I like to believe I'm a little more level headed and less likely to throw childish tantrums (although it does still happen periodically) I'm an employee of a decent paying automobile manufacturing company and I'm learning to appreciate the single life and my own strengths on a much deeper level. I'll be filling you in on the humdrum of my routine life periodically, little livejournal. Until next time my electronic plethora of thoughts :D

It seems I have a lack of updating you as often as I would like, my lovely little livejournal. I find it rather depressing that I haven't had time to fill you in on how my life is progressing. Well as you know I've been in North Carolina for over a year now! So I'm happy to share that one of my goals is fulfilled anyway. (Getting the hell out of Mississippi) 

So my older sister is pregnant and I'm going to be an Aunt. I guess I'm excited, but I doubt I will be getting to see my little nephew hardly ever since, you know, Celeste lives up in Canada and so forth. She and I aren't really speaking right now anyway. I can hardly call it my fault though. She needs to understand that not everything revolves around her and that there's more to life than what she wants and when she wants it. I wish her the best of luck in everything she does but I don't think her dreamworld with this new marriage and baby will last. Reality has got to rear its ugly head at some point and I honestly don't think she'll be ready when the time comes for it.

I've been writing a lot more recently but every time I get started on a new story I can't seem to continue it. It's like I just get a lack of enthusiasm and it lays unattended somewhere forever only to be discovered years later. I really wish my brain would stop over analyzing things and just stick to one thing at a time. This is why I never finish anything. Because I can't concentrate on one thing at a time...it's like I try but I get distracted with something else, so I find myself trying to finish 3 things at once. 

I can't live up to my own expectations and its killing me. I'm my biggest critic and I'm kind of a hard ass. Things at work haven't been going favorably either. I'm tired of filling in for people who don't want to work on weekends or with people they are uncomfortable with. In the end I'm the one who always ends up filling in for them and I've just about had it with all the bullshit that's been going down at the store. But as they say no good deed goes unnoticed and no bad one goes unpunished. Karma is a bitch and I hope for those lazy fuckers that she's on the rag soon. Anyway, I have a lot to be doing if I want to accomplish my new goals (finish some of my fiction and copyright and publish it) As well as move out of Jonah's parents house soon. Well adieu my friends, for that handful that might actually read this.

Sometimes...I really wonder about my family. Jonah and I have come down to visit them this week and they have hardly acted like it was a big deal. They just sit around all day watching tv or playing the stupid wii. I feel like Jonah and myself just wasted the 550 dollars we scraped and saved just to get down here for this week. I don't understand how some people can be so selfish. They have hardly spent anytime with us and my sister and her new husband have both been selfish freaking pricks since they got here. I'm beginning to feel as though I have officially emancipated myself from them altogether. They never consider anyone but themselves and I guess my fiance and I are just dead weight. Fine by me. I won't pay another cent for a VERY long time to come down here. I love my family to death...but some things need to change.

So here I am. It's been quite awhile now hasn't it lovely little livejournal? But alas! I am here again. You know what I've decided? I am so damn sick of humoring pathetic dramatic people. I mean seriously, some people seriously need to grow the hell up and act like a mature adult. I really think some people never really get over themselves and for the past few days its been driving me insane just thinking about it. But you know what, livejournal? I pity them. People like that never go anywhere in life. They never progress. Why you may ask. Its simple really. Because they never learn to evaluate themselves. 

It made me so angry at first, but now...It really is just so damn pathetic. Grown adults act this way. What a depressing thing it is. Some people live their whole lives miserably because they can't understand why people don't agree with everything they say. Well you know what loser...that's life. NOBODY agrees with everything you say. And the people who don't disagree to your face are just humoring you so you'll shut up and go away. How sad to live your life that way. But luckily for you...I'm not angry anymore. I gave someone so many chances to prove to me they weren't a jackass. But I gave them one too many chances. So you know what...I forgive you for being the way you are. But when you are old and useless in your age, and all alone you'll hate yourself for what you've done to people who have tried. So all in all you were a cunt, you are a cunt, and you will forever be...a fucking cunt until you learn to check yourself. I'm over it.

Hello my darling livejournal. I must say I'm a bit overwhelmed by college these days. Higher level courses (or at least the ones I am taking) seem to be nothing but research papers and summaries every night. I'm getting rather bored of it, to say the least. 

One of these days I'll get a job and buy myself an old truck like I've been dying to for the past few years. I applied at food lion online today. I'm thinking maybe it would be better to go apply in person thought. I'm also going to apply at Pilot Travel centers. It wouldn't be too bad of a job. I'm not even going to be picky these days. Its not like I know anyone up here. I could really care less. I'm not too proud for any job anymore. 

I always was a hard working individual. Whether anyone would like to believe it or not. I enjoy making my own money and working for it. I'm an ambitious woman. I don't like my man to always buy everything for me while I sit around. I can't stand it. I honestly don't know how women do that. It's so insane. You sit on your ass all day while your husband puts food on the table, pays all the bills, and works his self to the bone? I'm sorry. I just can't do that though. I was never meant to be a housewife. It's not for me. I'm just working woman who equally puts in as much work as her man.

My sister is moving to Canada. Blah. I say she doesn't know what she is doing. She's rushing off into another relationship again. As usual. Who can tell her anything though? It's just a lesson she will have to learn on her own. Ah well. I have work to do now. I'll be back later though!

Muah!

All my love,

Amber Laya~

I have just started school this past week up here in NC. What can I really say? School is school. Alamance is a little smaller than Northeast but the campus is very convenient. Its only like 15 minutes away from our house and thankfully I'm only taking 4 classes this semester. All of which I should have no problem with. Developmental psychology is already looking pretty easy. I really like my teacher and the class is very small. Only about 12 of us in there. Art appreciation is looking to be pretty boring, but nothing seriously hard. Hell, its not even going to be a challenge. By the way, my art teacher's name is Mr. Fishman. I'm not joking either. You say it just like that. Fish-Man. I could not contain myself when he introduced himself. He was like, My name is Mr. Fishman...don't laugh. Its not funny. And then everyone did. Let's see American Literature looks like its going to be pretty boring too. But I doubt I'll have any troubles academically, maybe just trying to stay awake. And as for my speech class...well I actually like it. My teacher is awesome and so are the people in the class. I'm looking forward to this year. A new start. A new school. A new life. I am riding on a blue sea in the sky and I am on control.

I cannot begin to contain myself. Just 10 more days!!! Ten more days and my Jonah will be back from Bangladesh!! I am so excited no one understands. He has been gone for 3 weeks and it has been an absolute hell for me. The first day he left I could not stop crying, that night in our bed, I felt as though there was a hole forming in my heart. He wasn't beside me and he wouldn't be with me for a month. It was as though the happiness that my heart had finally found was abruptly stolen away right before me. I had never known such emptiness in all my being. The next few days weren't any better. My mental state was all but stable.
